meta.sourceNotes: Primary source: Faith Javane & Dusty Bunker's 'Numerology and The Divine Triangle'. Expression 11 is treated as a master vibration (the higher octave of 2): illumination, inspired communication, spiritual service.
meta.generationGuidelines: Focus on luminous messaging, refined sensitivity, ethical influence, and the discipline required to ground inspiration into serviceable form.

profiles.coreEssence: Expression Number 11 is a beacon—receiving high-voltage insight and transmitting it as clear, compassionate guidance.
profiles.lifeLesson: Carry the light, not the spotlight. Your work is to refine revelation into language that serves, with humility and grounded follow-through.
profiles.shadowSignature: Spiritual superiority, nervous overdrive, and vague promises that dissipate trust. Antidote: humility rituals, body-grounding, and commitments you can prove.

physical.notes: Fine-tuned nervous system; benefits from gentle, regular grounding practices.

mental.notes: Symbolic and synthetic thought; excels at translating intuition into frameworks.

emotional.notes: Empathic sensitivity; needs boundaries to avoid emotional flooding.

intuitive.notes: High receptivity; spontaneous insight, synchronicity, and pattern recognition.

decisionMaking.text: Receive the download, then test it—pair revelation with verification before you commit.
Ask, 'Who is served and how will we know?' to keep inspiration measurable.
Translate intuition into options with clear risks, costs, and review dates.
Prefer choices that preserve integrity over speed or applause.
Invite a grounded advisor to reality-check timelines and scope.
Use small pilots to prove the path before public promises.
Choose language you can stand behind later; avoid prophetic absolutism.
If signals conflict, wait for convergence or reduce the bet size.
Document rationale so teachings remain accountable to truth.
When torn, pick the path that lifts the most while harming none.
Define 'done' as a delivered benefit, not just a moving testimony.
Close with gratitude and commitments that can be checked.

stressResponse.text: Under stress your system hums hot; downshift with breath, water, and light movement before speaking.
When doubt spirals, return to one simple service act to restore agency.
Limit inputs; curate who and what gets access to your attention.
Name the feeling and the need before offering guidance to others.
Ground physically—barefoot on earth, warm drink, gentle stretching.
Move tender talks off public channels to private, paced conversations.
Use time buffers; sleep on charged messages before sending.
Ask for co-regulation: a trusted voice that reflects you back to calm.
Protect sleep; intuition distorts when exhausted.
Let silence be holy again; pause until clarity returns.
Trace anxiety to unclear boundaries and renegotiate them.
End stress cycles with a gratitude inventory to widen perspective.

communication.text: Speak plainly about mystery—define terms, name limits, and show your method.
Use light-filled metaphors that invite, not separate; humility keeps the door open.
Credit sources—scripture, science, and lived experience—so trust compounds.
Ask consent before offering readings or unsolicited insight.
Keep cadence calm; wisdom whispers more than it shouts.
End messages with one specific next step people can try today.
Translate paradox into practices: both/and framed with examples.
Use stories that dignify subjects; never exploit pain for clout.
Invite questions and hold them with curiosity, not defense.
Publish corrections when you err; integrity brightens your halo.
Protect sacred experiences with privacy and consent for sharing.
Close loops with written recaps; light likes a clear container.

relationships.text: Name your sensitivity and need for quiet so love can plan around your charge.
Practice ordinary affection; not every moment needs spiritual meaning.
Ask for consent before offering 'downloads' about loved ones.
Repair quickly when your tone sounds superior; apologize and simplify.
Keep promises small & kept; credibility is love’s ballast.
Schedule tech-light meals and walks to nurture closeness.
Hold space without rescuing; trust others’ paths.
Let partners see the human behind the teacher; share fears plainly.
Celebrate your partner’s gifts publicly and often.
Design shared boundaries with communities/followers to protect home.
Use humor to deflate pedestal dynamics gently.
Practice seasonal retreats together to reset and rebind.

productivity.text: Work in resonance blocks—deep focus after quiet time; protect mornings for signal, afternoons for shipping.
Batch content and schedule; inspiration is lightning, publishing is plumbing.
Define outcomes as transformations delivered, not just impressions.
Hire or partner with operators who love details and deadlines.
Create templates for talks, workshops, and rituals.
Use checklists for events to protect your nervous system.
Time-box 'open channel' hours; leave the rest for off-stage life.
Archive teachings with tags for future retrieval and courses.
Set 'no' quotas; scarcity of yes keeps quality high.
Close projects with testimonials and measurable impact notes.
Schedule true sabbaths where nothing is optimized.
Practice 'good-enough' craft to avoid perfection paralysis.

financial.text: Price offerings to sustain the mission and your health; martyr math collapses service.
Separate charity from business; be clear which hat you’re wearing.
Use transparent terms, refunds, and expectations; trust is tender.
Automate cushions so you can rest between cycles.
Invest in training, editors, and ops—force multipliers for your gift.
Track time and outcomes to price based on value, not vibes.
Tithe quietly and consistently to aligned causes.
Decline predatory partnerships; alignment over exposure.
Keep clean books; clarity is devotion in numbers.
Design scholarships with criteria instead of ad-hoc discounts.
Build a freedom fund so you don’t say yes from fear.
Publish impact reports to close the money-trust loop.

creative.text: Channel insight into forms that travel—poems, parables, diagrams, and prayers.
Edit mystical language into plain words without losing wonder.
Use light, sound, and silence intentionally in your events.
Co-create with musicians, designers, and storytellers for multisensory transmission.
Build a motif bank—symbols and scripts that repeat with integrity.
Prototype ceremonies before large gatherings to test flow.
Balance revelation with research; cite to honor lineage.
Design accessibility and trauma-awareness into creative work.
Let humor and kindness soften high voltage moments.
Archive drafts and voice notes; the raw often becomes the real.
Teach your creative method to multiply light-bearers.
Protect sacred IP from commodification; share wisely.

learning.text: Study symbolism, comparative religion, and rhetoric; your craft is meaning-making.
Pair intuition with method—note-taking, spaced repetition, and peer dialogue.
Translate learnings into micro-teachings within 24 hours to cement memory.
Collect counterpoints so your teachings don’t calcify into dogma.
Apprentice with elders; lineage steadies your light.
Keep a 'claims I made' log and revisit outcomes quarterly.
Practice debate with kindness; steelman before you answer.
Map your cognitive biases and set tripwires to catch them.
Learn trauma-informed facilitation to handle tender rooms.
Cross-train in science or philosophy to refine clarity.
Teach ethics alongside technique in all programs.
Reflect in writing after events: what served, what strained, what to change.

wellness.text: Treat your nervous system as sacred hardware—sleep, hydration, and gentle movement protect your signal.
Use quiet mornings; avoid instant immersion in everyone else’s energy.
Schedule white space between sessions to metabolize emotion.
Choose nourishment that steadies mood and attention.
Practice breath ratios that lengthen the exhale to calm the system.
Limit stimulants and late-night screens to protect dreams.
Keep grounding objects—stone, scarf, scent—for travel days.
Say no to environments that glamorize chaos or exploitation.
Let play and laughter discharge excess voltage.
Share care plans with your inner circle for accountability.
Track early signs of burnout; downshift before the crash.
Celebrate quiet health wins as seriously as public ones.

spiritual.text: Begin in silence and end in service—bookend practices that keep your channel clean.
Credit Source and lineage; humility keeps the light trustworthy.
Use discernment rituals when messages feel urgent; truth rarely panics.
Let prayer/meditation be dialogue—listening as much as speaking.
Practice forgiveness and repair; enlightenment includes accountability.
Create small blessings for thresholds—doors, meals, meetings.
Keep a gratitude ledger that names people, not just outcomes.
Fast from attention periodically to test attachment to platform.
Study justice as spiritual practice; fairness is sacred.
Hold paradox tenderly; mystery is not the enemy of clarity.
Guard against elitism; the light belongs to everyone.
End gatherings with consent-based touch/gestures or a shared silence.

shadow.text: When pedestal energy rises, step down—invite co-teachers and questions.
Replace vague prophecies with specific, testable commitments.
Notice spiritual bypass: name the human mess before the cosmic meaning.
Avoid diagnosing others; teach tools and let them self-discover.
Watch for contempt toward 'less awake' folks; choose patience.
Resist monetizing every sacred thing; preserve what must remain gift.
Keep confidences; do not share stories without explicit consent.
When envy or rivalry appears, bless their work and return to yours.
Limit exposure to adoration; set boundaries around praise and access.
Audit claims annually; retract cleanly where outcomes didn’t match.
Let tears and laughter humanize you; perfection is a prison.
Close ego loops with service—do the quiet task no one sees.

transitions.text: Treat thresholds as liturgy—announce what’s changing, bless what remains, and set review dates.
Communicate early and kindly with those affected; offer resources, not just rhetoric.
Carry one grounding ritual through the change to stabilize your signal.
Phase big changes; give your body and community time to adapt.
Invite elders to witness and advise during major pivots.
Archive the old chapter with gratitude and a clear rationale.
Protect sabbath time during transitions; noise is high, so stillness must be higher.
Publish Q&A to reduce confusion and projection.
Set ethical guardrails for new offerings before launch.
Measure early signals and adjust publicly with humility.
Close with a communal ritual—song, silence, or shared vow.
Document lessons so future transitions are gentler for all.

trinity.integration_notes: Expression 11 (Master) manifests Life Path and Soul Urge through illumination and serviceful speech—high-frequency insight translated into plain, practical help.
trinity.calculation: Sum the numbers of all letters in the full birth name; reduce to a single digit or master number (11, 22, 33, 44).
trinity.relationship_to_life_path: Life Path is the journey; Expression 11 broadcasts its wisdom with ethical clarity and compassion.
trinity.relationship_to_soul_urge: Soul Urge is the inner flame; Expression 11 carries it outward as guidance that dignifies free will.
behavioral_integration: Expression filters how Life Path lessons are illuminated and communicated to others.
Expression channels Soul Urge desires into teachings, art, and rituals that help in real life.
Alignment yields humble radiance—clear, kind, verifiable guidance.
Tensions appear as overexposure, vagueness, or ego inflation; grounding and accountability restore purity.
Service lens: light shared fairly, with credit to Source and care for people.

core_principles: Root in 'Numerology and The Divine Triangle' while keeping language plain and modern.
Describe HOW high-voltage intuition becomes ethical communication and action.
Honor consent, humility, and verification alongside inspiration.
Keep insights observable, practical, and respectfully spiritual.
Protect the nervous system—quality of signal equals quality of service.
behavioral_insights: Use intensity 0.6–0.9 strategically; include triggers/supports/challenges on high-leverage items.
Keep each insight 1–2 sentences and directly coachable.
Maintain 12 categories × 12 insights for ingestion consistency.
Avoid medical/financial absolutes; emphasize behaviors and governance.
Model accountability: sources, boundaries, and measurable outcomes.
divine_triangle_alignment: Expression derives from the full birth name numerology (master 11 is not reduced).
It represents talents, abilities, and communication style manifested outwardly.
It bridges inner motive (Soul Urge) and life curriculum (Life Path).
Growth arc moves from raw voltage and idealism to refined transmission and service.
Service lens: illuminated speech that uplifts without coercion.
categories_to_include: relationships - How they express in connection
productivity - How they express through work
financial - How they express value and abundance
learning - How they express curiosity and growth
spiritual - How they express divine connection
transitions - How expression evolves through change
